ygData.subject: Re: Bag of TINKERER's Information...
ygData.msgSnippet: the bag of tinkers is sold in Sol A at the gnome keep.  It sells from a merchant for 6-7k depending on faction and charisma of course. ... From: Stogie EQ
ygData.messageBody:
the bag of tinkers is sold in Sol A at the gnome keep. It sells from a
merchant for 6-7k depending on faction and charisma of course.


-----Original Message-----
From: Stogie EQ <stogie_eq@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, August 16, 1999 5:29 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] Bag of TINKERER's Information...


>From: "Stogie EQ" <stogie_eq@...>
>
>Hello all! Well met all you fellow EQ "Cheaters." he he! Well... I'm fairly
>new to the list and wanted to change things up a bit and touch on 2 new
>subjects...
>
>1) Where in the world can you find a BAG OF TINKERER? I've only read about
>this item and never seen one in game. I understand that it's 10-Slots and
>everything placed inside is WEIGHTLESS!!! Wow! Is this bought from a hidden
>NPC? Looted from a MOB? Who knows? Anyone with any information on this care
>to share?
>
>2) I am also interested in MAXIMUM POWER GAMING! Oh no... let the RP'ers
>flame begin. he he! What I mean is this... Can someone direct me to a web
>site or provide our fine list of "cheaters" some SOLID information on what
>MOBS provide the BEST xp at what level(s). Surely this information must be
>out there somewhere... Or better yet, let's start a list and share our own
>experiences on what we have found individually that gives GREAT xp at
>certain levels.
>
>Here's my contribution on the Fastest XP/Level discussion... I just
recently
>started a Wizard and I was AMAZED how fast my XP rose while fighting GIANT
>BATS in BBlock Mountains at level 8-9. The bats don't SWARM to protect each
>other and there are always plenty to be found at night in the area around
>the crossroads.
>
>Anyone else? I assume that I can speak for all of us when I say "All
>levels/zones/MOBS would be GREATLY appreciated! Let's gain some XP thru our
>group! BTW... I tend to SOLO a lot due to "multitasking" at home during the
>night. You know... family stuff. he he! The tip on the Giant Bats was a
SOLO
>tip.
>
>Until next time... great "CHEATING" (errr... sharing knowlege) and best of
>luck in NORRATH!
>
>-Stogie
>
>
>
>
